Any of the Mississippi State students who began lining up Jan PERIOD  as early as  a.m PERIOD for Kentucky tickets could testify tickets are valuable this basketball seasonand hard to get PERIOD Area restaurant managers and bar owners have targeted the Starkville sports fan crowd PERIOD

The Little Dooey offers more than food on game days PERIOD They have six television sets throughout the facility PERIOD Derek Willis staff member and soon to be night manager calls game nights 

This Starkville favorite schedules extra help on game nights in order to maintain good service for everyone PERIOD

For the high profile Kentucky game Little Dooey reached its seating limit PERIOD For students who fail to get tickets Little Dooey always proves to be a popular alternative PERIOD

 said Willis PERIOD 

Another local restaurant prone to seeing a rush on game days is Abners PERIOD Known for its college town appeal and sports theme not to mention its chicken tenders Abners is  says restaurant manager Adam Chronister PERIOD

The staff at The Veranda which opened last year consider themselves  says manager Spencer Morrill PERIOD 

One other night of the year which is a highlight for business is Superbowl Sunday which falls this year on February  PERIOD While Little Dooeys closes on Sundays Abners plans to be showing the game as well as serving  during the Superbowl said Chronister PERIOD

A popular place for students and alumni of Mississippi State The Verandas bar was as busy or busier on big game nights than it would be on the usual  said Morrill PERIOD
